 2004-09592004-09-01,  ,  JUS,  , 
ActContraventions Act
PrecisRegulations Amending the APPLICATION OF PROVINCIAL LAWS REGULATIONS by ensuring that, during the prosecution of a contravention under the Manitoba judicial system, the accused would have the same language rights as if he or she had been prosecuted under the Criminal Code.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2004-0188 Publication Date: 2004-09-22
